command.name: help
command.description: Returns list of commands or specific instructions on the command specified by `<command>`

command.name: reddit
command.description: Returns a random post of the specified subreddit under `<subreddit>` (without 'r/'). Specifying `random` returns a random post from a random subreddit. Use `§okbr` to return a random post from r/okbuddyretard.\n\nAny post returned is marked SFW on reddit.

command.name: ping
command.description: Returns the latency of the bot.

command.name: source
command.description: Returns basic information about the bot.

command.name: echo
command.description: For debug purposes. Returns exactly the message you pass through.
